byline.contributor: Yufan Huang and Adam Wu contributed research.

abstract: Chinese authorities report detonation of explosive-filled packages at 13 sites in Liucheng County in southern China, causing blasts that kill seven people and injure over 50; police arrest male suspect, whose full name is not released, and rule out terrorism.
lead_paragraph: The police identified a local man as the suspect in the blasts, which struck 13 sites and appeared to be caused by explosives left in parcels.

headline.main: Series of Explosions in Southern China Kill at Least 7
headline.print_headline: A Wave of Explosions Kills 7 in China

snippet: The police identified a local man as the suspect in the blasts, which struck 13 sites and appeared to be caused by explosives left in parcels.
